RapidFit:
////////////////////////////////////////// // Reference file for fit to data //////////////////////////////////////////
//================================================ // Formal Parameters to be fitted or fixed
//........................................ // Parameters which can be fixed for Scans
//Fractions
SignalFractionUBU_jpsi 0.68 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionUBT_jpsi 0.60 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionBU_jpsi 0.73 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionBT_jpsi 0.63 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionBU 0.7699 0.0 1.0 Fixed Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionBT 0.7199 0.0 1.0 Fixed Unitless
LongLivedFraction 0.85 0. 1. Fixed Unitless
// Mass
alphaM_pr_fzero // exponent 0.0013 Fixed Unitless
f_sig_m1_fzero // Fraction of first Gaussian 0.858 0.0 1.00001 Fixed Unitless
sigma_m1_fzero // Gaussian width in MeV 6.31 0.0 100.0 Free MeV/c^{2}
ratio_21_fzero 2.606 1.0 10.0 Fixed MeV/c^{2}
m_Bs_fzero_2011 5367.394 Free MeV/c^{2}
m_Bs_fzero 5367.394 Free MeV/c^{2}
alphaM_pr_jpsi // exponent 0.0013 Free Unitless
f_sig_m1_jpsi // Fraction of first Gaussian 0.858 0.0 1.00001 Free Unitless
sigma_m1_jpsi // Gaussian width in MeV 6.5 0.0 100.0 Free MeV/c^{2}
ratio_21_jpsi 2.14 1.0 10.0 Free MeV/c^{2}
m_Bs_jpsi 5365.5 Free MeV/c^{2}
// LL lifetimes
f_LL1_fzero 1. 0.0 1.0 Fixed Unitless
tau_LL1_fzero 0.81 0.01 1. Fixed Unitless
tau_LL2_fzero 0. 0.00 0.0 Fixed Unitless
// LL lifetimes
f_LL1_jpsi // Fraction of first exponential 0.9921 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
tau_LL1_jpsi // First exponent 0.145 0.01 0.5 Free Unitless
tau_LL2_jpsi //Second exponent 0.994 0.05 3.0 Free Unitless
f_LL1_B_jpsi 1.0 0.0 1.0 Fixed Unitless
tau_LL1_B_jpsi 0.370 0.01 1. Free Unitless
tau_LL2_B_jpsi 0.0 0.00 0.0 Fixed Unitless
//.......................................... // Parameters which cant be fixed for scans
// True Physics Parameters for signal
gamma 0.656 0.0 10.0 Free ps^{-1}
deltaGamma 0.123 Free ps^{-1}
Aperp_sq 0.239 0. 1. Free Unitless
Azero_sq 0.504 Free 0. 1. Unitless
As_sq 0.037 0. 1. Free Unitless
delta_para 3.25 6.3 -6.3 Free Unitless
delta_perp 2.95 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
delta_zero 0.0 -3.3 3.3 Fixed Unitless
delta_s 3.02 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
deltaM 17.63 Free ps-1
Phi_s 0.12 Free Unitless
//.................................. // Detector Parameters
//Signal PDF time resolution parameters for double gaussian model.
timeResolutionScale 1.0 Free unitless
timeResolution1_jpsi 0.0434 Fixed ps
timeResolution2_jpsi 0.0853 Fixed ps
timeResolution3_jpsi 0.513 Fixed ps
timeResolution2Fraction_jpsi 0.165 Fixed unitless
timeResolution3Fraction_jpsi 0.0017 Fixed unitless
timeResolution1_fzero2010 0.0295 Fixed ps
timeResolution2_fzero2010 0.0555 Fixed ps
timeResolution3_fzero2010 0.413 Fixed ps
timeResolution2Fraction_fzero2010 0.27 Fixed unitless
timeResolution3Fraction_fzero2010 0.0121 Fixed unitless
timeResolution1_fzero2011 0.0300 Fixed ps
timeResolution2_fzero2011 0.0576 Fixed ps
timeResolution3_fzero2011 0.438 Fixed ps
timeResolution2Fraction_fzero2011 0.23 Fixed unitless
timeResolution3Fraction_fzero2011 0.0136 Fixed unitless
timeOffset //Leave at Zero, this is not used anywhere yet. 0.000 Fixed ps
// Angular acceptance factors
angAccI1 0.9795 // Fixed Unitless
angAccI2 1.0304 // Fixed Unitless
angAccI3 1.0307 // Fixed Unitless
angAccI4 0.0004 // Fixed Unitless
angAccI5 0.0012 // Fixed Unitless
angAccI6 -0.0005 // Fixed Unitless
angAccI7 0.9941 Fixed Unitless
angAccI8 -0.0031 Fixed Unitless
angAccI9 0.0005 Fixed Unitless
angAccI10 -0.0024 Fixed Unitless
// Mistag parameters
// Fixed Mistag for MP
mistag 0.5 Fixed
// Mistag calibration
mistagP1_2011 1.037 Free
mistagP0_2011 0.384 Free
mistagSetPoint_2011 0.379 Fixed
mistagP1_2010 1.01 Free
mistagP0_2010 0.338 Free
mistagSetPoint_2010 0.339 Fixed
//............................................ // Background model
//Long lived time resolution components
timeResLL1Frac_jpsi 1.0 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL1_jpsi 0.00 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL2_jpsi 0.00 Fixed Unitless
timeResLL1Frac_fzero 0.9863 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL1_fzero 0.088 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL2_fzero 5.94 Fixed Unitless
//========================================== // Specify which minimiser to use.
Minuit 100000 0.0001 1
NegativeLogLikelihood #Petes
1
//========================================== // Specify the fit
//................................... // This applies a constraint on deltaM
deltaM 17.63 0.11
timeResolutionScale 1.0 0.02
// This applies a constraint on mistag scale
mistagP0_2011 0.384 0.010
mistagP1_2011 1.037 0.081
mistagP0_2010 0.338 0.013
mistagP1_2010 1.01 0.12
// .................... // Attempt to constrain GH and GL positive
GLandGH 0.0 0.00001
// .................... // Attempt to constrain LLscan on the amplitudes
ATOTAL 1.0 0.00001
//======================================== // UN-BIASED UN-TAGGED events
SignalFractionUBU_jpsi
